text: Clark-Miller Roller Mill, also known as the Davis-Clark Roller Mill and W.M. Miller Roller Mill, is a historic roller mill located near Lansing, Ashe County, North Carolina. It was built about 1915, and is a two- to three-story, banked frame with weatherboard siding and a metal roof. It rests on a poured concrete foundation and has a side-gabled roof. The building houses an Anglo- American (Midget) Marvel brand roller mill. It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 2014. == References == Category:Grinding mills on the National Register of Historic Places in North Carolina Category:Grinding mills in North Carolina Category:Industrial buildings completed in 1915 Category:Buildings and structures in Ashe County, North Carolina Category:National Register of Historic Places in Ashe County, North Carolina
title: Clark-Miller Roller Mill
